channel.title: Life on T&M - A man's thinking and making
channel.description: Recent content in Life on T&M - A man's thinking and making

item.title: 纪念即将关闭的 Ohlife
item.description: Ohlife 还有三天就关闭了！下载了以前的全部记录，刚刚重温了一下，美好的记忆… 这是之前的全部记录了，无删节版，慎入~ 2013-03-02 对这里的鞋挺感兴

item.title: Summary of my 2012
item.description: The year 2012 has passed for almost 20 days. I’m a lazy blogger right ;-P. I really want to write something for my 2012. The reason for delay of writing was I had a math problem to solve. I was struggling a lot during the Christmas and new year holidays. I’ve been working everyday to expect a solution for the final step of the proof: matching two pieces of expressions, one was from the Laplace transform, the other was from the Eynard-Orantin recursion formula.
